name: SweetHex
description:
Based on the comic & characters by Colo-Art, SweetHex is a point-and-click adventure game following the erotic adventures of Mephia the succubus.
You play as Kyler, a mild-mannered suburbanite with an interest in videogames, comics, and the occult. One day while cleaning his room, he stumbles upon a magical tome about summoning demons. Following its instructions, he manages to summon a succubus named Mephia. She's a mischeveous little hellion and when she learns that Kyler has a crush on his neighbor & childhood friend, she comes up with a scheme to match the two would-be lovebirds together. While her intentions are pure- her methods are wild. Will true love prevail, or will Kyler and Rita's relationship become warped by depravity?



BEAUTIFUL HAND-DRAWN 2D ANIMATION: quality craftsmanship brings the characters and world to life

ROMANCE & RELATIONSHIPS: a wholesome love story with optional 18+ content for maximum intimacy

INTERACTIVE WORLD FILLED WITH SECRETS: from puzzles to easter eggs, there is much to discover

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
